dc_title_s: Carte de Perse dressée pour l'usage du Roy; Par G. Delisle.
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. In French. Some place names include geographical notes. Originally published by L'Isle in 1724. 1 map;: hand col.; 49 x 60 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: L'Isle, Guillaume de, 1675-1726.,Buache, Philippe, 1700-1773.,Starckman, P., engraver.
